media:group.media:title: Captain Marvelita: Bad L Angle
media:group.media:description:
TL;DW: Marvel was pretty flat and Alita was more well-rounded.
Correction: I was under the impression Carol was working her way up to an elite team on Star Force in her years with them--but instead the first mission /might've/ been her first mission ever? I'm not entirely clear on that.

media:group.media:title: THE LAST DEATH NOTE;R (Part 2)
media:group.media:description:
No surprises here, but enjoy.
Corrections: I called Naomi a wife instead of fiancée at one point and am too tired to re-render just to fix that. I wrote "Stevenster" instead of Sevenster. And DESPITE CALLING IT A NETFLIX ORIGINAL, Netflix had no hand whatsoever in producing the Fullmetal Alchemist movie.
